## Antibiotic Resistance

Aim:

-   Explore antibiotic resistance profile across species

-   Compare resistance profiles and assess the influence of different variables

-   Perform PCA to identify clustering based on resistance profiles

At this project we used data from: <https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/adilimadeddinehosni/multi-resistance-antibiotic-susceptibility/data>

## Bacterial Resistance Heatmap

![](images/heatmap_resistance.png){fig-align="center" width="4500"}

Heatmap shows antibiotic resistance across species, with *E. coli* and *K. pneumoniae* highly resistant (red), most others sensitive (blue), and some antibiotics effective across multiple species.
